mapper.insert: insert into nationtb(en_name, ko_name, dust, continents,showcnt, customer, weight, speech, price,s_date,f_date) values(#{en_name},#{ko_name},#{dust},#{continents},#{showcnt},#{customer},#{weight},#{speech},#{price},#{s_date},#{f_date});
mapper.update: update nationtb set en_name=#{en_name}, ko_name=#{ko_name}, dust=#{dust}, continents=#{continents}, showcnt=#{showcnt}, customer=#{customer}, weight=#{weight}, speech=#{speech}, price=#{price}, s_date=#{s_date}, f_date=#{f_date} where customer=#{customer};
